column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Output
column9: SQL Validation Query
column10: Success Criteria

column6: 1. Navigate to login page 2. Enter valid credentials (provider-001) 3. Click login
column7: User redirected to /dashboard/v2/documents with valid session token
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id='provider-001' AND expires_at > NOW();
column10: Session created in DB + token returned + redirected to dashboard

column6: 1. Click logout button 2. Verify redirect to login
column7: User session invalidated + redirect to /
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id='provider-001' AND is_active=true;
column10: Session marked inactive + token rejected on next request

column6: 1. Navigate to documents page 2. Wait for list to load
column7: Document list displays with 3+ sample documents from seed data
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM documents WHERE provider_id='provider-001';
column10: List loads within 2s + shows all user's documents only

column6: 1. Click Upload button 2. Select PDF file 3. Click confirm
column7: Document appears in list with 'processing' status + UI feedback
column9: SELECT status FROM documents WHERE provider_id='provider-001' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
column10: File stored + DB record created + status='processing'

column6: 1. Click document in list 2. Wait for detail view
column7: Detail page shows document title + metadata + parsing status
column9: SELECT title FROM documents WHERE id='[doc-id]';
column10: All metadata loads + no 404 errors

column6: 1. Click delete button 2. Confirm deletion
column7: Document removed from list + DB
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM documents WHERE id='[doc-id]';
column10: Document marked deleted + RLS prevents other users seeing

column6: 1. Navigate to ingestion admin 2. Wait for dashboard
column7: Dashboard loads with ingestion stats/panels
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM documents WHERE status='processing';
column10: All panels render + no 500 errors

column6: 1. Navigate to providers list 2. Wait for load
column7: List shows all 3 seed providers
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM providers;
column10: Displays all providers + can filter/search

column6: 1. View documents 2. Check for expiry warning
column7: UI shows warning if license expires within 30 days
column9: SELECT expires_at FROM licenses WHERE provider_id='provider-001';
column10: Warning badge appears + date accurate

column6: 1. View CME summary 2. Verify credit count
column7: Total CME credits matches sum of all CME records
column9: SELECT SUM(credits) FROM cme_events WHERE provider_id='provider-001';
column10: Total displayed = DB sum + no rounding errors

column6: 1. Log in as provider-001 2. Fetch /api/v2/documents 3. Verify only provider-001 docs returned
column7: Provider sees ONLY their own documents
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM documents WHERE provider_id != SESSION_USER_ID;
column10: Query returns 0 rows + RLS policy enforced

column6: 1. Admin fetches all providers 2. Admin cannot modify provider they don't own
column7: Admin can see all providers but only modify own data
column9: SELECT * FROM role_permissions WHERE admin_role='true';
column10: RLS allows admin view all + deny modify others

column6: 1. Upload document 2. Wait for parsing complete 3. Check notifications
column7: User receives notification + email sent
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM notifications WHERE user_id='[user]';
column10: Email in queue + notification created

column6: 1. Run migrations 2. Verify schema applied
column7: All tables exist with correct columns + types
column9: \d+ from information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema='public';
column10: No migration errors + schema matches code

column6: 1. Run referential integrity check 2. Check for orphans
column7: No orphaned records + all FKs valid
column9: SELECT * FROM documents WHERE provider_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM providers);
column10: Query returns 0 rows + no constraint violations

column6: 1. Upload doc 2. Verify appears in list 3. Delete doc 4. Verify cache invalidated
column7: Cached data invalidated after delete + fresh fetch works
column9: SELECT * FROM cache WHERE key LIKE 'doc:%';
column10: Cache cleared + new data fetched

column6: 1. Upload same doc from 2 tabs simultaneously 2. Verify no duplicates
column7: Only 1 document created + no race condition
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM documents WHERE uploaded_file_path='[path]';
column10: Exactly 1 record created + consistent state

column6: 1. Upload PDF 2. Wait for parse 3. View extracted text
column7: Text extracted from PDF visible in UI
column9: SELECT extracted_text FROM document_parse_jobs WHERE document_id='[id]';
column10: Parsing succeeds + text quality acceptable

column6: 1. Upload large PDF 2. Check parse status
column7: Upload succeeds + parsing queued + no timeout
column9: SELECT status FROM document_parse_jobs WHERE document_id='[id]' AFTER 60s;
column10: Status not stuck + parsing progress visible

column6: 1. Make 100 requests in 1s 2. Check rate limit
column7: Requests throttled after limit + 429 response
column9: SELECT count(*) FROM rate_limit_logs WHERE user_id='provider-001' AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE;
column10: Rate limit enforced + no data loss
